shortcv.p: Aggeliki Kostaki is a PhD candidate at Athens University of Economics and Business, in the Department of Management Science and Technology. She holds a first degree in Financial Services (Technological Educational Institute of Piraeus), an MSc in Banking and Finance and an MSc in Human Resources Management (both from Athens University of Economics and Business). She has over 30 years of solid multilevel experience in IT applications and since the 90’s she has participated in several SAP projects (2007-2010 as a Deputy Project Manager). Also, she is a (LAEK) certified instructor with over a ten-year teaching experience and an SAP Certified Application Associate – Human Capital Management with SAP ERP 6.0 EHP.

From 2011 she is a member of the OIS group. Her main interests lay in the field of Organizational Reform, Change Management, Business Process Analysis, ICTs and IT applications. She runs SAP and ARIS seminars for undergraduate and postgraduate students and she supports undergraduates’ assignments related to the implementation of e-learning courses via the moodle platform.
